explain: to use something, such as an opportunity, in a way that helps you
allowing you to do something easily or without trouble
to pass from a liquid to vapor when heated
to be made up or composed of
a plant grown for food, usually on a farm
able to support the growth of many plants
a special time or event when people gather to celebrate something
to think much of; to regard highly
statement: We took advantage of the warm weather and did some yard work.
Her possessions could fit in one suitcase.
The lightweight tent was convenient to carry.
We were advised to boil the water before drinking it.
A university consists of teachers, administrators and students.
The main crops in Taiwan are rice and fruit.
The soil in that area is extremely fertile.
Each year, a festival was held to celebrate the harvest.
His writing style is now boring and outdated.
